lexUnit.name: drawl.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: speak in a slow, lazy way with prolonged vowel sounds

sentence.text: “ Well , well , well , ” he drawled .
` Wear that green silky thing you had on last night , " he drawled .
` You make such an easy target , " he drawled .
` You 're very liberal with your criticism , Virginia , " he drawled huskily .
` I moved there when I was sixteen , " he drawled .
` Well , I had to do something ! " he drawled coolly .
` Or very ripe figs , " drawled Francis .
“ The Scots do n't look very … amusable , ” drawled Georgie , picking a bit of 1,000-year-old stone off the wall behind him and aiming it at a tent-peg .
` You do n't say ? " drawled Lexandro .
` Shade ungrateful , ai n't he ? " drawled Googol .
` Sure , " drawled the sergeant , placing a card on either side of the bowl .
` String 'em up , " drawled a Western voice .
` Well , well , " drawled Havvie Blaine , at last , ` what have we here ?
` How women gossip ! " drawled Damian Flint .
It was a cool challenge , drawled so quietly that she almost missed it .
Riley swore and Linley drawled that there was nothing to get upset about , because Harbury had himself cleared the way for the man Riley wanted appointed .
But needed some kind of help : she 'd spoken about it for months before and was utterly thrilled when Jay drawled an interest .
He drawled the warning , ` OK .
Jackson drawled the word with a slow complacency .
And , to top his performance , when all eyes were still on him , he drawled an answer to the king 's question .
` So , " drawled Damian as they strolled along , ` tell me how you keep your sensational figure , Rachel . "
` Hallo there , girls , " drawled the taller one .
Fonda studiously ignores the hairs as he drawls to an off-screen interrogator .
` Do n't look so alarmed , " he drawled under his breath .
` If you say so , " he drawled with a smug expression .
` Ah 've come for mah van , Duncan , " I drawled from the garage doorway .
` Sorry , " he drawled with blatant insincerity .
` Nice to see you too , darling , " she drawled in reply .
` How generous of you , " he drawled with heavy sarcasm .
The man 's gaze raked her clear complexion and pale gold hair , then his mouth twisted slightly as he drawled in a sardonic tone , ` What 's the matter , Cornflower ?
` Oh , I see , " he drawled with a touch of cool insolence .
Silas drawled from behind her , regarding Lucy with interest .
She talked to herself a little , lowering her voice and drawling carefully .
Belinda drawled gently , having some understanding of sibling irritations herself .
Finally Forster glanced at Lawton for support , and drawled laconically .
Cassie heard Johnny drawl , from the direction of the kitchen .
Luke drawled , allowing a weary sigh to escape from his lips .
` This one 's mine , " Isabel 's captor drawled .
Ross drawled as she joined him , clearly appreciating the sight before him as his hard grey eyes swept over her tall , slender figure .
Damian drawled , leaning back with his feet on the desk , studying the newspaper .
